rooms.name: Entrance Hall / Foyer
rooms.description: A welcoming open space with Scandinavian minimalistic design. Incorporates a small sitting area and display shelf for family memorabilia.

rooms.name: Open-plan Living & Kitchen
rooms.description: This is the heart of the penthouse, featuring an open-plan design that combines living, dining, and kitchen areas. Scandinavian elements include clean lines, neutral colors, and natural light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom with Balcony
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom designed for comfort and privacy, featuring ample storage space. The adjacent balcony offers a relaxing outdoor experience.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: This bedroom is designed with Scandinavian aesthetics in mind, focusing on simplicity and comfort. Includes built-in wardrobes for optimum space utilization.

rooms.name: Joint Family Study / Lounge
rooms.description: A flexible room that can serve as a study or lounge area for the joint family, integrating smart storage solutions and modern Scandinavian design elements.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Master & Guest)
rooms.description: Includes en-suite facilities in master bedroom as well as a guest bathroom. Designed with efficient fixtures and moisture-resistant materials for durability.

openings.name: Front Entrance Door
openings.description: A modern glass panel door that emphasizes Scandinavian design while ensuring energy efficiency.

openings.name: Side Balcony Access
openings.description: Balcony access doors from master and guest bedrooms leading to the balconies.

openings.name: Rooftop Terrace Entrance
openings.description: Access point to the rooftop terrace providing panoramic views of the surroundings.
